    æ‰“å¼€å®å¡”é¢æ¿open in new windowï¼Œå‡†å¤‡é…ç½® Nginx çš„ SSL è¯ä¹¦ã€‚å°†ä»¥ä¸‹ä¿¡æ¯å¤åˆ¶åˆ° Nginx çš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œä¿å­˜åé‡æ–°åŠ è½½é…ç½®ã€‚

    # HTTPS server

server {
    listen       443 ssl;
    server_name  localhost;

    ssl_certificate      /home/cert/nginx/tobebetterjavaer.com_cert_chain.pem;
    ssl_certificate_key  /home/cert/nginx/tobebetterjavaer.com_key.key;

    ssl_session_cache    shared:SSL:1m;
    ssl_session_timeout  5m;

    ssl_ciphers  HIGH:!aNULL:!MD5;
    ssl_prefer_server_ciphers  on;

    location / {
        root   /home/www;
        index  index.html index.htm;
    }
}

    è®°å¾—åœ¨å®å¡”é¢æ¿å’Œäº‘æœåŠ¡å™¨åå°æ”¾è¡Œ 443 ç«¯å£ã€‚
